function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate housing and lack of basic services, including water and waste management, create ideal habitats for expanding Ae. aegypti populations","Impact":"Increased risk of Aedes-borne viral diseases spreading in urban and peri-urban areas","Mitigation":"Improving housing and basic services, implementing effective waste management, and creating awareness about vector control methods","Technologies":"Improved housing infrastructure, waste management systems, and vector control methods","People":"Residents of urban and peri-urban areas","Owner":"Local government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Geographic expansion of vectors and viruses through globalization and urbanization","Impact":"Increased geographic spread of Aedes-borne viral diseases","Mitigation":"International collaboration on vector control, travel restrictions, and monitoring of global movement of vectors","Technologies":"Global surveillance systems, travel monitoring technology, and international vector control coordination","People":"Global population","Owner":"International health organizations and governments"},{"Description":"Lack of investment in Aedes vector control leading to ineffective prevention of Aedes-borne epidemics","Impact":"Higher susceptibility to Aedes-borne diseases outbreaks","Mitigation":"Increased funding for Aedes vector control research, development, and implementation","Technologies":"Advanced vector control methods, surveillance technology, and public health education campaigns","People":"Communities at risk of Aedes-borne diseases","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions, and government agencies"}]}
